title: rAjagOpAlam bhajEham
sahitya:
rAjagOpAlam bhajEham ramAlIlam


anupallavi

 tEjOmaya mOhanakaram divyAmbarAdi dharam 
gajarAja pUjita padam guNijana nata gOvindam


caraNam   nAradAdi krta bhajanam nAdalaya yuta sadanam 
haridrA nadI tIram hatyAdi pApaharam pArijAta tarumUlam 
pankaja nayana vishAlam guruguha hita vanamAlam gOpIjanam AlOlam
